A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not a fan fiction or extended universe junkie. And I didn't love the prequels\, but they were tolerable.  They had some magic moments.  This movie had none.  As a stand-alone movie I could see how it could get a good review\, but as a Star Wars movie\, it is an epic fail.  I am not just saying that because it does not follow my preconceived notions of what should happen.  I am saying that because it is not consistent with the previous films.  Not even TFA.  I felt like Rian Johnson was giving the middle finger to all star wars fans on this one.
